content:
In an Excel table format, list the steps a customer service representative should take when handling a customer complaint.

| Step | Action |
|------|--------|
| 1.   | Greet the customer and listen to their complaint attentively. |
| 2.   | Apologize for the inconvenience caused and assure the customer that their issue will be resolved. |
| 3.   | Ask relevant questions to understand the issue better. |
| 4.   | Offer a solution or provide alternatives to resolve the issue. |
| 5.   | Follow up with the customer to ensure that the issue has been resolved to their satisfaction. |
| 6.   | Document the complaint and the steps taken to resolve it in the company's CRM system. |
| 7.   | Thank the customer for bringing the issue to the company's attention and for their business. |
